name: osagai
description: A tiny library for creating WebComponents in a Functional way

scripts.cp:package: npm run build && cp package.json dist/ && cp README.md dist/
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run cp:package && npm run test:all && git commit -am $npm_package_version && git tag $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags && npm publish dist

author: Henrique Limas <henrique.ramos.limas@gmail.com>
